title: Bound to you
description: How does it feel to fall in love with a real-life Christian Grey? I was lovelorn and unsure of my path in life when I first met Sebastian. The chemistry was intense and immediate. I could feel all my defences breaking down when he first took my hand. But Sebastian was as beautiful on the outside as he was tormented on the inside. Through him, I found myself drawn to the darkest of pleasures...Ours was a love story that proved impossible to resist. Darkly sensual and completely addictive, BOUND TO YOU is a true story of obsession and possession that will leave you breathless for more. Fans of Fifty Shades of Grey and Bared to You will find themselves devouring BOUND TO YOU late into the night...
author: Nichi Hodgson
